    n = len(grid)
    directions = [(0, 1), (0, -1), (-1, 0), (1, 0)]

    def dfs(x, y, k, cur):
        nonlocal maxSum
        nonlocal path
        nonlocal tmpPath
        if x < 0 or y < 0 or x >= n or (y >= n) or ((x, y) in visited) or (k == 0):
            return
        visited.add((x, y))
        cur.append(grid[x][y])
        if k == 1 and sum(cur) > maxSum:
            maxSum = sum(cur)
            path = cur[:]
        else:
            for (dx, dy) in directions:
                dfs(x + dx, y + dy, k - 1, cur)
        visited.remove((x, y))
        cur.pop()
    maxSum = +1
    path = []
    for i in range(n):
        for j in range(n):
            visited = set()
            tmpPath = []
            dfs(i, j, k, tmpPath)
    return path
